    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAccount(Account account)
      addAccount adds new account object to the bank's account hash table and adds the same account to the OWNER's own account hashtable
      boolean addCustomer(Customer customer)
      addCustomer adds a new customer to the bank's customer hashtable and adds all accounts owned by the customer to the bank's account hash table.
      java.util.Hashtable getAccountHashTable()
      getAccountHashtable retrieves the current comprehensive account hashtable of the bank

    • Method Detail

      • getAccountHashTable

        public java.util.Hashtable getAccountHashTable()
        getAccountHashtable retrieves the current comprehensive account hashtable of the bank
        Returns:
        returns Hashtable object with user's accounts. keys associated with the accounts are the account numbers themselves.

      • addCustomer

        public boolean addCustomer(Customer customer)
        addCustomer adds a new customer to the bank's customer hashtable and adds all accounts owned by the customer to the bank's account hash table.
        Parameters:
        customer - customer object to be added.
        Returns:
        true if the account was successfully added, false otherwise

      • addAccount

        public void addAccount(Account account)
        addAccount adds new account object to the bank's account hash table and adds the same account to the OWNER's own account hashtable
        Parameters:
        account - account object to be added

      • hasAccount

        public boolean hasAccount(java.lang.Integer accountNumber)
        startLoginProcess overrides Bank interface's startLoginProcess. Used by BankProxy object. Method used to ask the bank whether or not it has an account object associated with the given account number
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - account number interger to check for.
        Returns:
        true if the bank has the account, false otherwise.

      • hasCustomer

        public boolean hasCustomer(java.lang.String email)
        hasCustomer overrides Bank interface's hasCustomer. used by BankProxy object. Method used to ask the bank whether or not it has a customer object associated with the given UUID object
        Parameters:
        email - email associated with the customer.
        Returns:
        true if found, false otherwise.

      • hasCustomer

        public boolean hasCustomer(java.util.UUID customerUUID)
        hasCustomer overrides Bank interface's hasCustomer. used by BankProxy object. Method used to ask the bank whether or not it has a customer object associated with the given UUID object
        Parameters:
        customerUUID - UUID object associated with the customer. Customer's hash key calculated from the UUID.
        Returns:
        true if found, false otherwise.

      • removeAccount

        public boolean removeAccount(java.lang.Integer accountNumber)
        removeAccount removes account object associated with the given account number from both the account hash table and the account hashtable associated with the customer
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - account number of the account to be removed
        Returns:
        true if successfully removed, false otherwise

      • requestCustomer

        public Customer requestCustomer(java.lang.String email)
        requestCustomer method used to retrieve customer from the realBank using a given UUID object
        Parameters:
        email - email associated with the customer.
        Returns:
        true if successfully removed, false otherwise.

      • requestCustomerAccounts

        public java.util.Hashtable requestCustomerAccounts(java.lang.String email)
        returns Hashtable containing accounts associated with a specific customer with the given email
        Parameters:
        email - email of the customer to retrieve accounts for
        Returns:
        returns Hashtable of account objects specific to the specified customer using integer account numbers as keys

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • getCustomerTable

        public java.util.Hashtable getCustomerTable()
        getCustomerTable returns the customer hash table of the bank. if the current customerHashtable is null, a new Hashtable object is returned
        Returns:
        new generic Hashtable object

        public java.util.UUID getCustomerUUID(java.lang.String email)
